part2.model_answer: I really love to eat a homemade chicken salad, which is both Nutritious [有营养的] and delicious. It contains many fresh vegetables that are good for my Diet [饮食]. part2.question:

Although the taste is bitter, I drink it because it improves my Immunity [免疫力] and makes my skin glow. It keeps me Fit [健美的] and slim throughout the year. I found the Recipe [食谱] online recently.
